title: Red want to play with me for my 1k wins... in ARAM???
body:
Coming up on 1k wins in Aram, a very prestigious occasion.  Kinda.  

Any reds want to join me and my buddies as we play?

replies.body: I love ARAM! Count me in! Let's figure out a time!
Sure, I'm still at 997 right now.  Just add me anytime, I usually play anywhere from 9pm-1am PST, usually around 5 games a night or so.
